name: protondrive-tauri
description: Proton Drive desktop client - one-line installer
author: DonnieDice

scripts.build:linux: npm run build:web && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:rpm: npm run build:web && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -- --bundles rpm
scripts.build:appimage: npm run build:web && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -- --bundles appimage
